extendedInfo.description: The all new Coles app makes it quicker and easier to do your shopping at Coles: â¢ Browse weekly specials and add them to your shopping list â¢ Use the barcode scanner to quickly write your weekly shopping list â¢ Share and instantly update your lists with family or friends â¢ Browse Curtis Stone recipes, watch the Recipe Video and add the ingredients to your shopping list â¢ Sort your shopping list by aisle â no more walking around looking for that last item!

reviews.title: Terrible
reviews.comment: I used this app to keep my shopping list. Walked into a Coles store and fired it up. Couldn\'t connect to access my shopping list as there is little to no signal inside the Coles store. Why require a connection when all stores seem to have the same issue. Signal blackout!
reviews.author: Luke Shaw

reviews.title: Poor execution
reviews.comment: Crashes when selexting an item in list. Cant change an item in list to have 0 quantity so can keep in my list and just buy when I need to. Need some serious investment in UX.
reviews.author: Christian Biggs

reviews.title: Ok but listed items not in stock
reviews.comment: No distilled water on aisle 10 or in the whole store. Wasted my time.
reviews.author: Ian Smith

reviews.title: Pathetic - absoluty useless
reviews.comment: Shame you cannot enter a zero for review.   The product finder is useless.  According to store staff,  the items about which I queried them had not been stocked for over 12 months, if ever. Also where are the prices ???,
reviews.author: mj cs

reviews.comment: Just un installed what a useless app and does not show prices. Terrible.\tJust un installed what a useless app and does not show prices. Terrible.
reviews.author: Cheryl Vidich

reviews.title: Going downhill.
reviews.comment: Used to love this app but it is getting harder to use!  Latest update means I can\'t go from the shopping list to the scanner and vise versa! Very annoying!
reviews.author: Sandra Mackenzie

reviews.title: Could be better
reviews.comment: Would be nice to see the prices. And if the isles could be updated when locations are changed.
reviews.author: Ash Brown

reviews.title: Poorly done
reviews.comment: Doesn\'t display the prices of items when scanned... I thought that was the point
reviews.author: Liana Hawes

reviews.title: Keeps closing down. GRRR!
reviews.comment: It would be nice if there was a way to keep a running total as you shop. Would help those on a budget. But at the moment I can\'t even keep the app open for more than 5-10 seconds at a time. VERY frustrating...uninstalling.
reviews.author: Tania Cattuzzo

reviews.title: Horrible, Horrible, Horrible
reviews.comment: Why bother releasing such a useless app?  Did Coles get someone\'s 12 year old cousin to put this garbage together?  Have a look at the Woolworths\' app and maybe have a good hard think and try again.  Now I can see why there are so many 1 star ratings..  Removing it as I speak!!!
reviews.author: W Vendetta

reviews.title: Needs more features
reviews.comment: Like needs to be able 2 share n send shopping list out 2 someone else
reviews.author: Kellie Green

reviews.title: Looks good,  but.....
reviews.comment: Looks good,  though does not show prices of items when searched for. Also missing photos of quite a few products  Also rather pointless having this app to show where items are in store if there\'s no mobile or free wifi network coverage when you\'re there. Uninstalled.
reviews.author: Greg M

reviews.title: Really?! No prices?!
reviews.comment: I can\'t understand why there are no prices on this app. Does Coles really think prices are irrelevant for their customers?! Also - missing is a \'copy to another list\' function, along with a \'copy list to online shopping account\' function.  Uninstalling.
reviews.author: Gina Kenah

reviews.title: Hard to use
reviews.comment: It\'s much worse than the Woolworth\'s app. There is not a catalogue. I have to do a search for the one I don\'t know. There\'s not price when I add items to my shopping list. I can\'t delete a shopping list. I will give 5 stars if these could be fixed.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Scanner does not work.
reviews.comment: Shop with list. Great! Tells which isle. Awesome!! Has scanner to add to list by barcodes, DOES NOT WORK.  WASTES TIME.
reviews.author: Daniel Bourke

reviews.title: Absolute rubbish
reviews.comment: Where are the prices?????? I thought it would make life easier but nope without the prices its useless really. DONT BOTHER
reviews.author: Scott Stevenson

reviews.title: Love it
reviews.comment: Useful
reviews.author: Lee Johnson

reviews.title: Waste of time
reviews.comment: Keeps shutting down when I try to open my shopping list. No prices hardly worth having. Uninstalled.
reviews.author: Kerston Chislett

reviews.title: Terrible and useless
reviews.comment: Waste of space this app is.  It\'s no use as the features don\'t work properly
reviews.author: Alessandro Clementi

reviews.title: One word
reviews.comment: CRAP!
reviews.author: Rocco L
